summary: This new code file, "genres.css", introduces styling for various components in the system related to genres. It includes CSS properties for defining the layout of boxes, posters, headers, logos, menus, and menu options. It introduces styles for interactive elements like hover effects on headers and images. The file also includes styling for a responsive design and transitions for smoother user interactions. Additionally, it adds specific styling for the menu and its options, including animations for hover states. Overall, this file contributes to enhancing the visual presentation and user experience within the genres-related components of the system.
